name: 陳文輝
objective: The goal of this course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics, including ubiquitous computing and self-driving by reading and discussing recent literature to expand our vision in the future.
schedule:
Week1. Course Introduction
Week2-3. Ubiquitous Computing
Week4-5: Smart Environments
Week6-7: Smart Technology
Week8-9: Midterm Presentation
Week10-11: Activity Recognition
Week12-13: Autonomous Driving
Week14-15. AI for Autonomous Vehicles
Week16. Business Visit (Living 3.0)
Week17-18. Project Presentations
materials:
Lecture Notes & Selected Readings
